articles.description: Josef Newgarden has won the pole for IndyCar’s season-opening race, giving Team Penske something to celebrate as its leadership faces criticism for its management of the series. It made for a weird Saturday on what's supposed to be a celebratory weekend as In…
articles.content: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. (AP) Josef Newgarden won the pole for IndyCars season-opening race on Saturday, giving Team Penske something to celebrate as its leadership faced criticism throughout the paddock… [+5280 chars]

articles.author: Eric Hansen
articles.title: Notre Dame Wbb Playing For Injured Watson Now As Irish Roll Into Acc Finals - Insidendsports - Irish Illustrated
articles.description: No. 4 seed Notre Dame routs top seed Virginia Tech, 82-53, on Saturday, but loses starting post Kylee Watson.
articles.content: Kylee Watson did the honors of placing the Notre Dame sticker into the championship game line on the big bracket in the back hallway at Greensboro Coliseum Saturday, to the roaring approval of her Ir… [+6962 chars]

articles.author: Jackson Collier
articles.title: Controversial No-call Late Proves Costly For Arkansas Razorbacks In Loss At Alabama - Rivals.com - Arkansas
articles.description: A late no-call during Arkansas' loss at Alabama left fans and head coach Eric Musselman pretty upset Saturday.
articles.content: The Arkansas Razorbacks (15-16, 6-12) left Coleman Coliseum with a bitter taste in their mouth after dropping a 92-88 heartbreaker to the Alabama Crimson Tide (21-10, 13-5 SEC) in overtime Saturday. … [+2883 chars]
